str_event_pharaoh_emperor_description Pharaoh_of_Egypt^^Egyptian_custom_requires_a_god_pharaoh_as_an_intermediary_between_the_people_and_divine_world._Since_Egypt_became_a_province_over_a_century_ago,_this_role_is_traditionally_held_by_Caesar_Augustus,_the_Princeps_of_Rome.^^Though_the_Roman_people_do_not_much_care_about_such_Egyptian_customs,_the_fertile_Nile_valley_is_a_vital_grain_source_for_the_city,_and_they_do_care_about_that._Disruptions_in_grain_supplies_will_quickly_hit_the_popularity_of_any_ruler.^^An_elaborate_ceremony_involving_a_whole_ancient_kingdom_worshiping_you_as_a_god_would_not_hurt_a_new_Caesar's_credibility_either._Once_you_control_Thebae,_it_is_time_to_be_officially_recognized_as_Pharaoh.

str_intro_01 Rome_was_founded_the_twin_brothers,_Romulus_and_Remus_who_were_raised_by_a_she-wolf_and_eventually_returned_to_their_birthplace_to_reclaim_their_rightful_place_as_rulers._Under_the_rule_of_the_seven_kings,_Rome_grew_into_a_powerful_city-state._The_kings_became_too_arrogant,_debauched_and_greedy._Thus_the_people_of_Rome_drive_them_out_and_established_the_Republic._The_senate_and_the_people_of_Rome_conquered_and_subjugated_neighboring_tribes_and_city_states._The_Romans_reflected_on_their_divine_origin,_that_they_shall_rule_the_world_with_their_authority.
str_intro_02 Constant_wars_slowly_brought_order_to_the_world._The_city_states_and_tribes_of_Southern_Italy_were_subjugated._Other_powers_noted_the_conquests_and_tried_to_defeat_Rome,_but_the_march_of_the_eagles_could_not_be_stopped.
str_intro_03 The_Greek_city_states,_who_were_so_proud_about_their_independence,_were_subjugated._The_successors_of_Megas_Alexandros_were_conquered._Roman_eagles_marched_as_far_as_Egypt.
str_intro_04 The_expansion_reached_its_peak_with_the_conquest_of_Gaul_and_the_subjugation_of_the_provinces_of_Asia_minor._The_sheer_amount_of_power_had_to_corrupt._Civil_wars_shaked_the_Republic._At_first_it_looked_as_if_the_republic_could_be_saved,_but_it_was_rotten_in_its_foundation._The_destruction_of_the_republic_was_unavoidable.
str_intro_05 Augustus_brought_an_end_to_the_turmoil_and_restored_order_and_principles_which_are_the_fundament_of_Roman_authority._The_conquests_continued_under_him_and_his_successors._From_Britannia_to_Egypt_and_from_Hispania_to_Asia_marched_the_eagles_of_Rome.
str_intro_06 Time_has_passed_and_great_turmoil_lies_ahead._Voices_whispers_of_doom_and_destruction,_yet_others_call_them_fools._The_Pax_Romana_brought_light_of_civilisation._Some_say_Rome_has_no_enemies_anymore,_which_is_not_true,_as_Rome_has_become_its_own_enemy.
str_bedriacum_description Across_the_firmament,_clouds_gather,_casting_shadows_upon_the_earth,_while_rain_descends_to_veil_the_plains,_and_the_wind,_a_fierce_symphony,_howls_its_lament._There_amidst_the_tempest,_you_stand,_embraced_by_the_rain's_harsh_caress._The_verdant_grass_and_stoic_trees_sway_in_harmony_with_the_gusts,_akin_to_the_undulating_waves_of_Neptun's_domain._Your_quiver_as_a_thunder,_the_voice_of_Jupiter,_resounds_overhead,_a_proclamation_of_divine_power_woven_into_the_fabric_of_nature.^In_the_midst_of_this_tumult,_a_solitary_beam_of_Sol's_golden_light_pierces_through_the_veil_of_clouds,_tenderly_kissing_your_countenance._In_that_fleeting_moment,_you_are_enveloped_in_radiant_warmth,_a_celestial_embrace_that_fortifies_and_consoles._Alas,_the_respite_is_ephemeral,_as_the_breach_in_the_heavens_swiftly_closes,_withdrawing_its_benevolent_touch._The_chill_of_solitude_returns,_accompanied_by_the_shroud_of_darkness,_and_with_them,_the_gnawing_anxieties_of_the_unknown_morrow.^Yet,_as_despair_threatens_to_consume,_reports_arrive_of_the_enemy's_swift_advance,_heralding_the_impending_clash_of_mortal_wills.
str_bedriacum_victory Upon_the_plain_lie_strewn_the_lifeless_corpses,_silent_echoes_of_the_battle_waged._Amidst_the_carnage,_you_stand_unmoving,_visage_adorned_with_crimson_streams,_a_testament_to_the_turmoil_of_strife._The_ethereal_chariots_of_the_heavens_yield_to_the_forceful_gales,_as_Aeolus_commands_the_clouds_to_flee._Sol,_in_his_radiant_chariot,_pours_forth_his_golden_streams_upon_the_earth's_bosom,_bathing_it_in_divine_light._Yet,_even_as_Apollo's_rays_caress_your_weary_frame,_the_sting_of_wounds_bears_witness_to_the_agony_of_mortal_combat.^Amidst_this_tableau_of_chaos,_the_avian_choir_weaves_its_melody,_harmonizing_with_the_anguished_cries_of_the_fallen._Their_lamentations_blend_with_the_strains_of_nature's_song,_a_dirge_for_the_fallen_heroes_who_now_rest_in_Hades'_embrace.
str_goy_burn_alive The_crowds_gather_in_front_of_the_Circus_to_watch_the_execution_of_{s10}._He_will_be_roasted_alive_and_his_flesh_will_be_feed_to_wild_dogs.^^{s10}_is_led_into_the_Circus_by_gladiators._Afterwards,_he_is_tied_to_an_iron_rod_and_placed_over_a_fire._While_he_is_being_roasted,_the_gladiators_engage_in_combat._Finally,_the_victorious_gladiators_depart_and_wild_dogs_are_released_into_the_Circus._As_the_grilling_fire_dies_out,_the_dogs_pounce_upon_{s10}.
str_goy_crucified The_crowds_gather_in_front_of_the_Circus_to_watch_the_crucification_of_{s10}._He_will_be_nailed_to_the_cross.^^{s10},_carrying_the_cross,_is_led_into_the_Circus_by_gladiators._Afterwards,_the_gladiators_nail_him_on_the_cross._While_{s10}_is_screaming,_the_gladiators_fight._It's_a_great_spectacle_and_the_plebs_enjoy_it.
str_goy_suicide {s10}_is_accompanied_by_the_Praetorian_guards_to_his_villa_in_Rome._He_is_allowed_to_eat_a_final_meal._Then_{s10}_opens_his_veins._Slowly,_life_escapes_from_his_body._After_his_death,_his_dead_body_is_handed_over_to_his_family.
str_drunken_event_1 He_was_already_drunk_when_I_arrived_here._Then_he_puked_in_the_middle_of_a_table._Terribly_embarrassing,_this_person.
str_drunken_event_2 He_took_a_lot_of_wine_during_the_meal._I_have_not_seen_such_a_devoured_guy_for_a_long_time.
str_drunken_event_3 He_has_already_drunk_a_liter_of_wine._He_will_puke_up_this_hall_soon,_I_am_sure.
str_drunken_event_4 Unbelievable_how_he_behaves_towards_the_slaves._I'm_sure_he_wants_to_fuck_the_fat_ones.
str_drunken_event_5 First,_he_pukes_in_the_corner_just_so_he_can_take_something_to_eat_again._Disgusting!

str_break_treaty_declare_war As_{s63}_feels_frustrated_by_{s64}_inactivity_towards_the_matter,_{s63}_decides_to_use_the_opportunity_to_break_the_treaty_with_{s62}_and_declare_war!
str_provokations_between_allies {s63}_asks_{s64},_leader_of_the_{s62},_to_punish_the_troublemakers._But_{s64}_ignores_{s63}_pleas._This_leads_to_future_tensions_between_them.

str_lord_intro_lybian_feast_1 Welcome_{playername}._What_a_wonderful_party!_Back_in_Rome,_such_gatherings_are_far_more..._formal_in_my_opinion._Here,_there's_a_certain_freedom,_a_looseness_to_the_air._It's_refreshing._I_dare_say,_some_of_these_Alexandrians_live_a_little_too_freely,_but_perhaps_that's_part_of_the_charm..._Let's_toast_on_the_charm_of_Alexandria!
str_lord_intro_lybian_feast_2 Welcome_to_The_Lybian's_grand_feast,_{playername}!_Alexandria_never_disappoints,_and_neither_does_our_esteemed_host._Have_you_seen_the_size_of_his_trade_network?_No_wonder_the_man_holds_such_influence._Though,_I_must_say,_it's_the_wine_that_has_my_attention_tonight_-_Greek,_of_course,_only_the_finest.

str_wlod_4_temple_1 You_and_Mancinellus_enter_the_shrine_of_Artimpasa,_and_are_welcomed_by_several_androgynous_Enarei,_who_seemed_to_be_charmed_by_the_two_of_you._You_enjoy_your_time,_that_is_until_a_Scythian_chieftain_enters_the_tent,_hoping_to_receive_a_blessing_by_the_Enarei,_only_to_find_you_and_Mancinellus_despoiling_them._You_are_chased_out_of_the_shrine,_and_together_with_your_friend_run_back_to_your_allies,_since_the_two_of_you_were_shirtless,_Wlodowiecus_put_two_and_two_together_and_punches_the_both_of_you,_then_he_launches_himself_at_Mancinellus,_almost_choking_him_to_death_but_is_stopped_by_you_and_a_few_others._You_then_quickly_pack_up_before_leading_the_caravan_out_of_immediate_danger._However,_the_Scythian_chieftain_quickly_gathered_a_host_of_warriors,_who_began_to_pursue_you_for_a_couple_of_days,_until_you_ran_across_an_Alannic_horde._Your_guide_quickly_tells_you_that_this_tribe_is_not_known_to_him,_and_soon_arrows_start_to_fly_in_your_direction._It_appears_you_are_trapped_between_two_armies._The_good_thing_is,_both_the_Scythians_and_the_Alans_despise_each_other!
str_wlod_4_temple_2 Mancinellus_enters_the_shrine_of_Artimpasa,_despite_your_warnings._The_despoiling_of_the_Enarei_made_the_Scythians_furious._Though,_your_own_personal_refusal_to_participate_earned_you_some_respect_among_the_Scythians,_despite_being_disobeyed_by_whom_they_define_as_your_subordinate._They_demand_Wlodowiecus_and_the_caravan_to_leave_the_temple_immediately_and_never_come_back_again._Wlodowiecus_gathers_the_group_and_heads_east,_giving_a_very_grim_look_of_disapproval_at_Mancinellus_who_seems_to_not_notice_that_his_disrespectful_behavior_again_brought_you_trouble_and_screwed_relations_with_locals._In_a_fit_of_rage,_Wlodowiecus_launches_himself_as_Mancinellus,_almost_choking_him_to_death_but_is_pulled_off_him_by_you_and_some_others._In_your_mind_you_wonder_whether_every_time_you_enter_some_settlement,_Mancinellus_should_be_put_under_house_arrest,_watched_by_the_Old_Mercenary_and_Hadrianus_to_prevent_him_from_following_his_unhealthy_urges_and_stupidity._Your_internal_thought_debate_is_suddenly_disturbed,_as_you_see_Alanic_scouts_shouting,_warning_about_an_Alan_host_which_is_about_to_attack_you.
str_wlod_4_temple_3 You_and_Mancinellus_enter_the_shrine_of_Artimpasa,_and_are_welcomed_by_several_androgynous_Enarei,_who_seemed_to_be_charmed_by_the_two_of_you._You_look_for_the_priestess_and_enjoy_your_time_with_her,_while_Mancinellus_is_enjoying_the_Enarei_nearby._Suddenly,_a_Scythian_chieftain_enters_the_tent,_hoping_to_receive_a_blessing_from_the_Enarei,_only_to_find_you_and_Mancinellus_despoiling_them._You_are_chased_out_of_the_shrine,_and_together_with_your_friend_run_back_to_your_allies,_since_the_two_of_you_were_shirtless,_Wlodowiecus_put_two_and_two_together_and_punches_the_both_of_you,_launching_himself_at_Mancinellus_and_almost_chokes_him_to_death_but_is_stopped_by_you_and_a_few_others._You_then_quickly_pack_up_before_leading_the_caravan_out_of_immediate_danger._However,_the_Scythian_chieftain_quickly_gathered_a_host_of_warriors,_who_began_to_pursue_you_for_a_couple_of_days,_until_you_ran_across_an_Alannic_horde._Your_guide_quickly_tells_you_that_this_tribe_is_not_known_to_him,_and_soon_arrows_start_to_fly_in_your_direction._It_appears_you_are_trapped_between_two_armies._The_good_thing_is,_both_the_Scythians_and_the_Alans_despise_each_other!
str_fortress_jilu_looted The_fortress_is_thoroughly_looted_and_razed_to_the_ground,_though_only_a_few_valuables_are_discovered._The_remaining_guards_are_captured_and_imprisoned,_left_behind_in_the_dungeons_where_Han_reinforcements_will_undoubtedly_find_them._Later,_a_Xiongnu_scout_reports_that_a_host_of_cavalry_is_approaching._You_swiftly_order_a_retreat.
str_fortress_jilu_retreat You_immediately_order_a_retreat_to_a_nearby_hill,_where_you_set_up_camp_to_tend_to_wounds_and_rest._However,_a_Xiongnu_scout_soon_reports_that_a_host_of_Han_cavalry_is_approaching.
str_event_grain_emperor As_Princeps,_you_must_decide:_will_you_allocate_emergency_resources_to_secure_alternative_supplies,_or_let_the_populace_fend_for_themselves_and_face_potential_unrest?
str_event_grain_ai_help Caesar_has_acted_decisively,_ordering_emergency_measures_to_secure_new_grain_supplies_for_the_city._The_people_of_Rome_are_relieved,_though_the_treasury_feels_the_strain.
str_event_grain_ai_ignore Despite_the_dire_news_of_grain_ships_lost_at_sea,_Caesar_has_chosen_not_to_intervene._The_markets_grow_barren,_and_murmurs_of_discontent_rise_among_the_Roman_populace.
str_event_male_penetrating In_the_dim_haze_of_the_lupanar,_shadows_intertwine_as_laughter_echoes_faintly_through_the_walls._A_fleeting_connection_forms,_a_reminder_of_the_many_roles_a_man_may_play_in_the_theater_of_life.

str_event_male_blowjob Words_dissolve_into_soft_murmurs_as_the_warmth_of_the_moment_carries_away_the_weight_of_the_world,_leaving_only_fleeting_sensations_and_stolen_breaths.
str_event_female_classic The_soft_glow_of_a_flickering_lamp_illuminates_her_impressive_curves._A_shared_rhythm_dances_in_the_air,_whispering_of_timeless_exchanges_and_mutual_solace.
str_event_female_butt In_the_small_alcove_of_the_lupanar,_the_fullness_of_the_moment_takes_shape,_both_playful_and_indulgent,_a_celebration_of_round_forms_and_passion.
str_event_female_blowjob The_warm_air_thickens_with_hints_of_spice_and_desire,_where_words_give_way_to_knowing_glances_and_quiet_offerings_beneath_the_golden_lamplight.
str_event_caravan_sciri The_caravan_assembles_at_dawn,_its_wagons_creaking_under_the_weight_of_goods_and_hopes._The_journey_leads_far_to_the_North,_toward_the_lands_of_the_Sciri_tribe,_where_the_forests_of_the_Balts_whisper_of_ancient_secrets.^^After_a_long_journey_through_dense_forests_and_cold_winds,_the_caravan_arrives_at_the_Sciri_settlement._Wooden_halls_rise_amidst_the_trees,_and_the_air_carries_the_scent_of_pine_and_distant_fires.
str_event_caravan_sagala Dust_rises_as_the_caravan_begins_its_trek,_the_scent_of_spices_and_exotic_wares_mingling_in_the_air._Ahead_lies_Sagala,_an_Indian_town_where_golden_temples_and_bustling_markets_promise_treasures_and_stories_untold.^^The_caravan_crests_a_hill,_revealing_Sagala_in_all_its_splendor._The_town_hums_with_life,_its_markets_brimming_with_spices,_silks,_and_the_vibrant_colors_of_India._Temples_stand_tall,_their_golden_spires_gleaming_under_the_sun.
str_event_caravan_djenne Under_the_scorching_African_sun,_the_caravan_ventures_southward,_crossing_endless_sands_and_verdant_oases._Its_destination_is_Djenne_Djanno,_a_town_of_huts_and_timeless_wisdom,_nestled_by_the_river's_life-giving_embrace.^^The_caravan_finally_halts_as_Djenne_Djanno_comes_into_view._Mudbrick_buildings_glow_in_the_afternoon_light,_and_the_nearby_river_glistens_like_a_ribbon_of_silver._Traders_and_locals_mingle,_their_voices_rising_in_a_harmonious_hum.
str_event_caravan_karsahr The_caravan_snakes_through_rugged_terrain,_its_path_weaving_between_mountains_and_plains._Ahead_lies_Karsahr,_at_the_far_edge_of_the_Ferghana_Valley,_where_merchants_and_wanderers_meet_at_the_crossroads_of_the_world.^^At_last,_the_caravan_reaches_Karsahr,_a_bustling_hub_at_the_western_edge_of_the_Ferghana_Valley._The_aroma_of_exotic_goods_fills_the_air,_and_the_sound_of_haggling_merchants_echoes_through_the_streets._This_is_a_place_where_cultures_and_stories_converge.
str_priest_sacrifice_begin priest_sacrifice_begin
str_priest_sacrifice_baduhenna Baduhenna,_goddess_of_battle_and_defense,_accept_this_sacrifice_as_a_tribute_to_your_might._Shield_us_from_harm,_guide_our_blades,_and_grant_us_victory_against_our_enemies._May_your_protection_be_unwavering_and_your_wrath_devastating_to_those_who_oppose_us.
str_priest_sacrifice_mars Mars,_god_of_war_and_strength,_to_you_we_offer_this_sacrifice._Grant_us_courage_in_battle,_unwavering_discipline,_and_triumph_over_our_foes._May_your_fiery_spirit_dwell_within_us,_as_we_fight_with_honor_in_your_name.
str_priest_sacrifice_dunraz Dunraz,_mighty_deity_of_the_storm_and_sky,_hear_our_call._Accept_this_sacrifice,_and_bless_us_with_your_power._May_your_winds_guide_us,_your_thunder_inspire_us,_and_your_rain_sustain_our_land.
str_priest_sacrifice_frijo Frijo,_goddess_of_love_and_fertility,_we_honor_you_with_this_offering._May_your_blessings_bring_harmony_to_our_homes,_abundance_to_our_fields,_and_joy_to_our_hearts._Shine_your_grace_upon_us.
str_priest_sacrifice_vest Vesta,_sacred_keeper_of_the_hearth,_accept_this_sacrifice._Let_your_eternal_flame_bring_warmth_and_unity_to_our_homes_and_our_people._May_your_protection_and_purity_guide_us_always.
str_priest_sacrifice_saturn Saturn,_ancient_lord_of_time_and_harvest,_to_you_we_dedicate_this_offering._Bless_us_with_your_wisdom_and_ensure_the_fruits_of_our_labor_are_plentiful._May_your_guidance_lead_us_to_prosperity.
str_priest_sacrifice_aphrodite Aphrodite,_goddess_of_love_and_beauty,_we_humbly_offer_this_sacrifice._Bestow_your_charm_upon_our_lives,_bring_passion_and_unity_to_our_bonds,_and_let_your_grace_enrich_our_world.
str_priest_sacrifice_jupiter Jupiter,_king_of_gods_and_ruler_of_the_heavens,_we_offer_this_sacrifice_in_your_honor._Bless_us_with_your_wisdom,_protect_us_with_your_might,_and_guide_our_people_with_your_justice.
str_priest_sacrifice_castor_pollux Castor_and_Pollux,_divine_twins_of_protection_and_victory,_accept_our_offering._Watch_over_us,_guide_us_in_battle,_and_bless_our_endeavors_with_your_celestial_favor.
str_priest_sacrifice_christus Christus,_Lord_of_compassion_and_salvation,_we_offer_this_sacrifice_in_reverence._Guide_us_in_your_light,_grant_us_forgiveness,_and_inspire_us_to_walk_in_your_righteous_path.
str_priest_sacrifice_yhwe YHWH,_almighty_and_eternal,_to_you_we_dedicate_this_sacrifice._Bless_your_people_with_strength_and_wisdom,_guide_us_in_your_commandments,_and_let_your_will_be_our_shield.
str_priest_sacrifice_alcis Alcis,_twin_deities_of_harmony_and_strength,_accept_our_offering._Unite_us_under_your_protection,_and_grant_us_balance_and_fortitude_in_all_we_do.
str_priest_sacrifice_mithras Mithras,_bringer_of_light_and_protector_of_oaths,_we_honor_you_with_this_sacrifice._Guide_us_through_darkness,_uphold_our_promises,_and_grant_us_strength_to_overcome_adversity.
str_priest_sacrifice_andraste Andraste,_goddess_of_victory_and_vengeance,_we_dedicate_this_offering_to_you._Empower_us_in_battle,_crush_our_enemies,_and_let_your_fierce_spirit_guide_us_to_triumph.
str_priest_sacrifice_maponos In_the_name_of_the_good_strength_of_the_underworld_gods,_I_invoke_Maponos_of_Arverion._Pursue_those_with_the_magic_of_the_infernals!
str_priest_sacrifice_gebeleizis Gebeleizis,_lord_of_storms_and_lightning,_we_offer_this_sacrifice_to_honor_your_power._Strike_down_our_enemies,_cleanse_our_lands,_and_protect_us_with_your_might.
str_priest_sacrifice_zalmoxis Zalmoxis,_god_of_immortality_and_wisdom,_we_humbly_offer_this_tribute._Grant_us_your_knowledge,_shield_us_from_harm,_and_guide_us_on_the_path_to_eternity.
str_priest_sacrifice_goitosuros Goitosuros,_healer_and_guardian_of_life,_accept_this_offering._Bless_us_with_health,_protect_our_families,_and_grant_us_the_strength_to_endure_life's_trials.
str_priest_sacrifice_artimpasa Artimpasa,_goddess_of_fertility_and_war,_we_dedicate_this_sacrifice_to_your_glory._Bless_our_fields_and_our_warriors,_and_grant_us_prosperity_in_peace_and_victory_in_conflict.
str_priest_sacrifice_mihr Mihr,_god_of_contracts_and_justice,_accept_this_offering._Let_your_light_shine_on_truth,_uphold_fairness_in_our_dealings,_and_guide_us_to_honor_our_bonds.
str_priest_sacrifice_armazi Armazi,_mighty_protector_and_ruler,_to_you_we_dedicate_this_sacrifice._Grant_us_your_strength,_shield_us_from_harm,_and_bless_our_endeavors_with_your_power.
str_priest_sacrifice_mazda Ahura_Mazda,_wise_lord_of_creation,_accept_this_offering_as_a_sign_of_our_devotion._Illuminate_our_path_with_truth,_bring_order_to_chaos,_and_guide_us_toward_righteousness.
str_priest_sacrifice_allat Al-Lat,_goddess_of_the_earth_and_fertility,_we_offer_this_sacrifice_in_your_name._Bless_our_lands_with_abundance,_protect_us_from_harm,_and_grant_us_your_favor.
str_priest_sacrifice_ifri Ifri,_guardian_of_the_desert_and_protector_of_travelers,_accept_this_sacrifice._Safeguard_our_journeys,_bring_prosperity_to_our_ventures,_and_watch_over_our_people.
str_priest_sacrifice_ammon Ammon,_god_of_hidden_strength_and_fertility,_we_honor_you_with_this_offering._Bless_our_endeavors,_grant_us_your_wisdom,_and_let_your_power_sustain_us.
str_priest_sacrifice_apedemak Apedemak,_lion-headed_warrior_of_the_south,_accept_this_offering._Bless_us_with_your_strength,_protect_our_lands,_and_grant_us_victory_over_our_foes.
str_sacrifice_description_begin sacrifice_description_begin
str_sacrifice_description_baduhenna Baduhenna,_goddess_of_battle_and_defense,_demands_a_worthy_sacrifice._I_shall_offer_the_blood_of_a_mighty_ram,_its_horns_adorned_with_ribbons_of_red,_symbolizing_strength_and_protection._Alongside,_I_shall_burn_juniper_branches_to_call_for_her_shield_to_ward_off_our_enemies.
str_sacrifice_description_mars For_Mars,_the_god_of_war_and_valor,_I_will_sacrifice_a_bull,_its_powerful_form_a_tribute_to_his_strength._Its_blood_shall_anoint_the_altar,_and_weapons_placed_before_him_will_symbolize_the_courage_and_discipline_of_those_seeking_his_favor.
str_sacrifice_description_dunraz Dunraz,_the_storm_lord,_demands_a_sacrifice_fitting_his_tempestuous_power._I_will_offer_a_black_goat,_its_spirit_symbolizing_the_restless_skies._With_it,_I_shall_burn_pine_resin_and_cast_barley_into_the_flames,_calling_for_his_winds_to_favor_us.
str_sacrifice_description_frijo Frijo,_goddess_of_love_and_fertility,_shall_receive_a_sacrifice_of_doves,_their_gentle_spirits_embodying_harmony_and_affection._I_will_also_offer_sweet_honey_and_fresh_milk,_poured_over_fragrant_flowers_to_invite_her_grace_upon_our_lives.
str_sacrifice_description_vest Vesta,_keeper_of_the_sacred_hearth,_calls_for_a_pure_offering._I_shall_bring_unblemished_grain,_fresh_fruit,_and_olive_oil_to_her_flames._These_gifts_will_honor_her_presence_and_ensure_the_warmth_of_her_protection_in_our_homes.
str_sacrifice_description_saturn Saturn,_lord_of_harvest_and_time,_shall_be_honored_with_a_sacrifice_of_a_young_lamb,_its_innocence_representing_the_cycle_of_life._I_shall_also_offer_sheaves_of_wheat_and_ripe_figs,_thanking_him_for_his_bounty_and_seeking_his_guidance.
str_sacrifice_description_aphrodite Aphrodite,_goddess_of_beauty_and_love,_will_be_pleased_with_offerings_of_rose_petals,_sweet_wine,_and_fragrant_myrrh._I_shall_also_sacrifice_a_white_dove,_its_purity_symbolizing_the_devotion_and_harmony_she_inspires_in_mortal_hearts.
str_sacrifice_description_jupiter For_Jupiter,_king_of_gods_and_ruler_of_the_heavens,_I_will_sacrifice_a_majestic_white_bull,_its_strength_and_purity_honoring_his_might._Laurel_branches_and_incense_shall_be_burned,_their_smoke_rising_to_the_skies_as_a_plea_for_his_favor.
str_sacrifice_description_castor_pollux Castor_and_Pollux,_divine_twins,_demand_a_dual_offering._I_shall_sacrifice_two_lambs,_representing_their_unity_and_celestial_power._Alongside,_I_will_burn_frankincense_and_present_olive_branches_to_call_for_their_guidance_and_protection.
str_sacrifice_description_christus Christus_does_not_demand_blood_sacrifices_but_offerings_of_faith_and_devotion._I_will_light_a_simple_candle,_symbolizing_the_light_of_his_teachings,_and_offer_bread_and_wine_in_reverence_to_his_grace_and_sacrifice_for_humanity.
str_sacrifice_description_yhwe YHWH_requires_no_bloodshed,_only_pure_devotion._I_will_burn_the_finest_frankincense_and_myrrh,_their_smoke_rising_as_a_symbol_of_prayer._Alongside,_I_shall_offer_unleavened_bread_and_dedicate_the_ceremony_to_his_eternal_glory.
str_sacrifice_description_alcis The_Alcis,_guardians_of_harmony,_shall_receive_two_white_stags,_representing_balance_and_unity._I_will_also_present_wreaths_of_oak_leaves_and_pour_mead_upon_the_altar,_seeking_their_blessing_upon_our_endeavors.
str_sacrifice_description_mithras Mithras,_protector_of_oaths,_calls_for_a_sacrifice_of_a_mighty_bull._Its_blood_shall_sanctify_the_ceremony,_while_sacred_bread_and_water_will_be_placed_upon_the_altar,_symbolizing_purity_and_strength_in_his_divine_light.
str_sacrifice_description_andraste Andraste,_goddess_of_victory,_shall_be_honored_with_the_sacrifice_of_a_warhorse,_its_strength_and_spirit_a_tribute_to_her_power._I_will_also_burn_rowan_wood_and_sprinkle_its_ashes,_calling_for_her_to_guide_us_in_battle.
str_sacrifice_description_maponos Maponos,_youthful_god_of_vitality,_shall_receive_a_sacrifice_of_a_young_deer,_its_vigor_representing_renewal._I_will_also_offer_fresh_spring_water_and_blossoms,_asking_him_to_bless_us_with_strength_and_endurance.
str_sacrifice_description_gebeleizis For_Gebeleizis,_lord_of_storms,_I_shall_sacrifice_a_black_goat_under_an_open_sky._Lightning-shaped_sigils_will_be_carved_into_the_earth,_and_I_will_burn_cedarwood_to_honor_his_might_and_seek_his_protection.
str_sacrifice_description_zalmoxis Zalmoxis,_god_of_immortality,_requires_a_solemn_offering._I_shall_sacrifice_a_white_ox,_symbolizing_purity,_and_burn_sacred_herbs_as_I_pray_for_his_guidance_toward_enlightenment_and_eternal_wisdom.
str_sacrifice_description_goitosuros Goitosuros,_the_healer,_calls_for_a_gentle_offering._I_will_sacrifice_a_lamb,_its_innocence_invoking_his_compassion._Medicinal_herbs_and_clear_water_shall_be_offered,_seeking_his_blessings_for_health_and_restoration.
str_sacrifice_description_artimpasa Artimpasa,_goddess_of_fertility_and_war,_shall_be_honored_with_a_sacrifice_of_a_red_mare,_symbolizing_life_and_power._I_will_also_present_barley_and_pomegranates,_asking_for_her_favor_in_both_peace_and_conflict.
str_sacrifice_description_mihr Mihr,_god_of_justice_and_light,_shall_receive_an_offering_of_a_white_ram._I_will_burn_frankincense_and_offer_freshly_baked_bread,_seeking_his_guidance_to_uphold_truth_and_fairness_in_our_deeds.
str_sacrifice_description_armazi Armazi,_the_great_protector,_demands_a_sacrifice_worthy_of_his_power._I_shall_offer_a_bull_and_burn_juniper_branches,_invoking_his_might_to_shield_us_from_harm_and_grant_strength_to_our_people.
str_sacrifice_description_mazda Ahura_Mazda,_the_wise_lord,_requires_a_pure_and_reverent_offering._I_will_present_sacred_fire,_burn_sandalwood,_and_offer_milk_and_honey,_symbolizing_devotion_and_seeking_his_guidance_toward_righteousness.
str_sacrifice_description_allat Al-Lat,_goddess_of_the_earth,_shall_receive_offerings_of_wheat,_dates,_and_milk._I_will_also_sacrifice_a_white_lamb,_asking_for_her_blessings_of_fertility,_prosperity,_and_peace_upon_the_land.
str_sacrifice_description_ifri Ifri,_guardian_of_travelers,_shall_be_honored_with_a_sacrifice_of_a_goat,_its_strength_symbolizing_endurance._I_will_also_burn_desert_sage,_praying_for_her_protection_and_guidance_on_the_journeys_ahead.
str_sacrifice_description_ammon Ammon,_god_of_fertility_and_hidden_power,_demands_an_offering_of_a_strong_ram._I_will_burn_cedarwood_and_offer_wine,_seeking_his_wisdom_and_blessings_upon_our_endeavors.
str_sacrifice_description_apedemak Apedemak,_lion-headed_warrior,_shall_be_honored_with_the_sacrifice_of_a_lion_or_a_strong_bull._I_will_also_burn_acacia_wood_and_present_golden_ornaments,_seeking_his_protection_and_strength_in_battle.
str_bad_omen_1 As_the_sun_sets,_the_campfire_crackles_ominously,_casting_long,_flickering_shadows._Suddenly,_a_raven_lets_out_a_series_of_harsh_cries_before_flying_directly_overhead,_disappearing_into_the_blackened_sky._The_men_murmur_nervouslyravens_are_said_to_be_harbingers_of_death._Whispers_spread_through_the_group,_and_unease_settles_heavily_upon_the_camp.
str_bad_omen_2 During_the_night,_a_strange_wind_sweeps_through_the_camp,_chilling_everyone_to_the_bone._It_carries_with_it_the_faint_sound_of_wailing,_though_no_one_can_determine_its_source._The_more_superstitious_among_your_party_whisper_of_restless_spirits,_and_the_dread_seems_contagious._Sleep_does_not_come_easily_that_night.
str_bad_omen_3 A_traveling_merchant_crossing_your_path_brings_troubling_news:_a_blood-red_comet_has_appeared_in_the_night_sky,_a_sign_of_impending_doom._Though_you_dismiss_his_words_as_nonsense,_you_notice_many_in_your_party_exchanging_fearful_glances._Such_tales_have_a_way_of_taking_root_in_men's_minds.
str_bad_omen_4 At_dawn,_you_discover_that_a_flock_of_vultures_has_taken_roost_near_your_camp._Their_baleful_eyes_watch_your_every_move,_and_their_presence_feels_oppressive._The_men_begin_to_mutter_darkly,_and_morale_falters_as_their_courage_wavers_under_the_birds'_sinister_gaze.
str_bad_omen_end bad_omen_end
str_good_omen_1 At_sunrise,_a_beam_of_light_breaks_through_the_clouds,_shining_directly_on_your_camp._The_warm_glow_seems_almost_divine,_and_the_men_take_it_as_a_blessing_from_the_heavens._Spirits_rise_as_laughter_returns_to_the_camp,_and_the_day_begins_with_renewed_vigor.
str_good_omen_2 During_the_march,_a_white_stag_appears_on_a_nearby_hill,_its_proud_figure_standing_against_the_horizon._Many_take_it_as_a_sign_of_the_gods'_favor,_a_rare_and_auspicious_sight._The_men_cheer_and_march_onward_with_lifted_hearts,_believing_success_is_surely_ahead.
str_good_omen_3 A_strange,_soothing_breeze_sweeps_through_the_camp_at_dusk,_carrying_the_sweet_scent_of_blooming_wildflowers._The_oppressive_weight_of_the_journey_seems_to_lift,_and_the_men_exchange_hopeful_smiles._Someone_murmurs_about_the_gods_smiling_upon_the_group,_and_morale_surges.
str_good_omen_4 In_the_dead_of_night,_as_the_camp_rests,_the_stars_above_shine_with_extraordinary_clarity,_their_light_forming_shapes_that_some_interpret_as_divine_symbols._The_party_awakens_refreshed,_speaking_excitedly_of_the_vision._The_stars,_they_believe,_are_guiding_them_to_glory.
str_good_omen_end good_omen_end

str_description_legio_begin description_legio_begin
str_description_legio_1 Location:_Stationed_in_Germania_Superior_at_Moguntiacum_(Mainz)_from_70_AD.^Notable_commander:_Gaius_Dillius_Vocula_(during_Batavian_Revolt,_69_-_70_AD).^Emblem:_Capricorn.
str_description_legio_2 Location:_Garrisoned_in_Numidia_(North_Africa)_at_Theveste,_later_Lambaesis_(c._75_AD).^Notable_commander:_Quintus_Anicius_Faustus_(late_1st_century).^Emblem:_Pegasus.
str_description_legio_3 Location:_Destroyed_in_86_AD_during_the_Dacian_Wars;_previously_stationed_along_the_Rhine.^Notable_commander:_Unknown_legate.^Emblem:_Elephant_(awarded_by_Julius_Caesar).
str_description_legio_4 Location:_Deployed_in_Germania_Inferior_(Castra_Vetera)_until_70_AD,_later_Pannonia.^Notable_commander:_Aulus_Caecina_Alienus_(69_AD).^Emblem:_Capricorn.
str_description_legio_5 Location:_Britannia_after_43_AD,_based_at_Camulodunum_and_later_Deva_Victrix.^Notable_commander:_Gnaeus_Julius_Agricola_(70_-_73_AD).^Emblem:_Boar.
str_description_legio_6 Location:_Stationed_in_Hispania_Tarraconensis_until_c._70_AD,_then_relocated_to_Germania.^Notable_commander:_Unknown_legate.^Emblem:_Bull.
str_description_legio_7 Location:_Moesia_(Balkans)_by_9_AD,_later_at_Burnum_(Dalmatia).^Notable_commander:_Marcus_Annius_Afrinus_(mid-1st_century).^Emblem:_Neptune_holding_a_dolphin.
str_description_legio_8 Location:_Pannonia_(Carnuntum)_until_89_AD.^Notable_commander:_Marcus_Antonius_Primus_(during_69_AD_civil_war).^Emblem:_Lion.
str_description_legio_9 Location:_Moesia_at_Oescus_from_6_AD;_fought_in_Judea_(67_-_70_AD).^Notable_commander:_Sextus_Vetulenus_Cerialis_(67_AD).^Emblem:_Bull_and_eagle.
str_description_legio_10 Location:_Syria_and_Judea;_participated_in_Corbulo's_Armenian_campaigns_(60s_AD).^Notable_commander:_Gnaeus_Domitius_Corbulo_(58_-_63_AD).^Emblem:_She-wolf_with_Romulus_and_Remus.
str_description_legio_11 Location:_Judea_(70_-_117_AD);_destroyed_Jerusalem_in_70_AD.^Notable_commander:_Sextus_Lucilius_Bassus_(71_-_73_AD).^Emblem:_Ship.
str_description_legio_12 Location:_Rome_(Castra_Praetoria).^Notable_commander:_Lucius_Seius_Strabo_(prefect_under_Tiberius).^Emblem:_Scorpion,_linked_to_Tiberius'_zodiac_sign.
str_grain_success_1 Your_timely_intervention_has_ensured_the_city's_grain_supply._The_senators_express_their_satisfaction_as_the_provisions_are_distributed_to_the_grateful_citizens_on_the_Campus_Martius._Your_standing_within_the_Senate_has_undoubtedly_improved.^^Yet,_whispers_from_the_Palatine_indicate_that_the_Princeps_views_your_independent_actions_with_a_degree_of_displeasure,_posibly_concerned_by_the_precedent_set_or_the_political_implications_of_your_success.
str_grain_success_2 Word_of_your_successful_grain_delivery_spreads_quickly!_Amidst_cheers_and_gratitude,_the_vital_supplies_are_distributed_to_the_populace_on_the_Campus_Martius._The_Senate_is_visibly_pleased_with_your_decisive_action_and_generosity.^^However,_reports_suggest_the_Princeps,_Caesar_Augustus,_is_less_than_amused_by_this_turn_of_events,_perhaps_seeing_it_as_an_unwelcome_spotlight_on_his_administration's_perceived_shortcomings_or_an_overreach_of_senatorial_influence_facilitated_by_your_efforts.
str_grain_success_end end
str_subculture_hispanic_tarraconensian Iberian
